items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Max Hold Sport is our strongest scalp protector.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Max Hold Sport is our strongest scalp protector, offering our strongest protective barrier for active & humid-weather wearers. It helps protect the scalp from potential irritation, while also serving as an adhesive booster for longer and stronger hold times.

 

It’s the ideal choice for wearers who live active lifestyles or live in extremely hot or humid areas.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use  

nbsp

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). SDS sheet is available below.
items.displayname: Max Hold Sport - 1.4 fl oz, Dab-On
